thread.section_title: The Maritime Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Surprise!
thread.title_full: Surprise! - Review of The Maritime Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Neil K
title: Surprise!
text:
Second time here, found it as an option to Gansevoort and Standard in Meatpacking district. While not as cool and hip, this is such a comfortable place and a lot less. Love the lobby sitting area and the rooms are really comfortable. My second time here and there was a bottle of wine waiting for me. Everyone is so nice it really feels great. I drive into the city and there is a great parking lot right across the street that they discount for you. Half a block from Chelsea Market and shopping. Last time spent some time with friends in the lobby with cocktails and some food and it was fantastic. This is a real gem in my book, right next to TAO and you can even get room service from there. If you book on line you may end up in a room across from the elevators so if thats not for you book then call to ask to be somewhere else. I have been across form them twice but its not noisy or an issue at all. Rooms are not big, but very comfortable, clean and I like the dark wood. Free Wifi. Not pretentious or flashy but high quality. Big props to Matt Moore the General Manager, you run a nice place and should be proud. I will stay here as much as I can,
